New Records: Rizwan's 56 from 38 balls was his 28th T20 fifty on the international stage
Key Match Events: A second-wicket partnership of 139 between Mohammad Rizwan and Babar Azam proved decisive
Shaheen Shah Afridi produced a superb spell of three for 14 from four overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ireland failed to take full advantage of being 95 for one at the halfway stage
Pakistan responded from losing the opening match of the series to take it 2-1
